== Dell E6510 ==

=== System Basic Info ===

This is a system with a HD 1920x1080 screen and integrated Intel Graphics(!). Untill this kernel 2.6.38-5 in Natty alpha-3 there was the black screen issue, making it hard to used it with ubuntu.

'''system-manufacturer''' (dmidecode -s system-manufacturer):
<pre>
Dell Inc.
</pre>

'''system-product-name''' (dmidecode -s system-product-name):
<pre>
Latitude E6510
</pre>

'''system-version''' (dmidecode -s system-version):
<pre>
0001
</pre>
